title.rendered: “IDF Hits Hezbollah Targets in Lebanon: An Update on Recent Airstrikes and Security Alerts”

content.rendered:
IDF spokesperson:

The IDF continues to attack Hezbollah targets in Lebanese territory

Earlier today, fighter jets attacked terrorist infrastructure and military buildings of the terrorist organization Hezbollah in the areas of Ayta al-Shaab, Al Adaisseh, Eaterun, and Ramiya in southern Lebanon.

Following alerts about an unmanned aircraft infiltrating the north of the country, the events have ended, no casualties or damages have been reported. In addition, an explosive rocket fell in Yiftah earlier today, no injuries.

Following the alerts in the north of the country, several launchings were identified, some of them fell in open areas, no casualties.

Attached is documentation from the attacks: https://bit.ly/3ULM0vd
